price: 6. Et qui, lorsque les hommes seront rassemblés (pour le Jugement Dernier), seront leurs ennemies et renieront l’adoration qu’ils leur vouaient ?
arabic: وَإِذَا حُشِرَ ٱلنَّاسُ كَانُواْ لَهُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ وَكَانُواْ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ḥushira al-nāsu kānū lahum aʿdāan wakānū biʿibādatihim kāfirīna
